snippet: Marcus Foligno tied the game with 2 minutes 1 second left in regulation and Buffalo avoided its eighth straight loss.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Buffalo Sabres beat New York Islanders, 4-3, ending losing streak; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marcus Foligno tied the game with 2 minutes 1 second left in regulation and Buffalo avoided its eighth straight loss.

headline.main: Sabres Defeat Isles in Shootout for First Win
headline.print_headline: Sabres Defeat Isles in Shootout for First Win
